channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: The fall forecast is in and there’s some bad news for fall l
item.description: The fall forecast is in and there’s some bad news for fall lovers around the country.

item.title: A group of organizations and businesses said today they've j
item.description: A group of organizations and businesses said today they've joined in a legal action with Pahlisch Homes to require the City of Bend to pause the implementation of a new tree code policy that they claim will further increase Bend’s sky-high housing costs.

item.title: Very cold this morning! We'll warm up to the 70s today, just
item.description: Very cold this morning! We'll warm up to the 70s today, just a couple degrees below normal. Lows tonight will be a bit chilly again. Then, we have a big heat up heading into the holiday weekend. Happy Wednesday! #ktvzweather
